searchSql.baseSql:
SELECT A.PKID PKID, B.CASE_CODE, A.RANSOM_CODE, C.PROPERTY_ADDR, D.AGENT_NAME, D.GRP_NAME, B.BORROWER_NAME, B.COM_ORG_CODE, B.RANSOM_STATUS, B.STOP_REASON, B.BORRO_MONEY, B.UPDATE_TIME FROM sctrans.T_RA_TAILINS A LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CASE B ON A.RANSOM_CODE = B.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO C ON C.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO D ON D.CASE_CODE = C.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_APPLY E ON A.RANSOM_CODE = E.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_INTERVIEW F ON A.RANSOM_CODE = F.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REPAY G ON A.RANSOM_CODE = G.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CANCEL H ON A.RANSOM_CODE = H.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REDEEM I ON A.RANSOM_CODE = I.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_PAYMENT J ON A.RANSOM_CODE = J.RANSOM_CODE WHERE 1 = 1 <ifNotNull ransomStatus> AND RANSOM_STATUS = #ransomStatus# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull ransomProperty> AND RANSOM_PROPERTY = #ransomProperty# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull teamCode> AND AGENT_NAME = #AGENT_NAME# </ifNotNull> <if test="searchInfo==0 and inTextVal != null and inTextVal != '' "> AND PROPERTY_ADDR like '%'+#inTextVal#+'%' </if> <if test="searchInfo==1 and inTextVal != null and inTextVal != ''"> AND AGENT_NAME like '%'+#inTextVal#+'%' </if> <if test="searchInfo==2 and inTextVal != null and inTextVal != ''"> AND BORROWER_NAME like '%'+#inTextVal#+'%' </if>
<if test="ransomSearchTime=='RANSOMAPPLY'"> AND D.CREATE_TIME = #start# AND D.UPDATE_TIME = #end# </if> <if test="ransomSearchTime=='RANSOMINTERVIEW'"> AND E.CREATE_TIME = #start# AND E.UPDATE_TIME = #end# </if> <if test="ransomSearchTime=='RANSOMREPAYMENT'"> AND F.CREATE_TIME = #start# AND F.UPDATE_TIME = #end# </if>
<if test="ransomSearchTime=='RANSOMDIYA'"> AND G.CREATE_TIME = #start# AND G.UPDATE_TIME = #end# </if> <if test="ransomSearchTime=='RANSOMPERMIT'"> AND H.CREATE_TIME = #start# AND H.UPDATE_TIME = #end# </if> <if test="ransomSearchTime=='RANSOMPAYMENT'"> AND I.CREATE_TIME = #start# AND I.UPDATE_TIME = #end# </if>

SELECT rc.RANSOM_CODE, rc.BORROWER_NAME, rc.BORROWER_TEL, (SELECT PROPERTY_ADDR from sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO pro WHERE pro.CASE_CODE = rc.CASE_CODE) PROPERTY_ADDR, (SELECT AGENT_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO ci WHERE ci.CASE_CODE = rc.CASE_CODE) AGENT_NAME, rc.RANSOM_STATUS, rt.SIGN_TIME, rt.PLAN_TIME, ri.INTERVIEW_TIME, rr.REPAY_TIME, rca.CANCEL_TIME, rre.REDEEM_TIME, rp.PAYMENT_TIME, rt.REST_MONEY, rt.LOAN_MONEY, ri.INTERVIEW_MONEY, rr.REPAY_MONEY FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE rc LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_TAILINS rt ON rc.RANSOM_CODE = rt.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_INTERVIEW ri ON ri.RANSOM_CODE = rt.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REPAY rr ON rr.RANSOM_CODE = ri.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CANCEL rca ON rca.RANSOM_CODE = rr.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REDEEM rre ON rre.RANSOM_CODE = rca.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_PAYMENT rp ON rp.RANSOM_CODE = rre.RANSOM_CODE
